definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: MethodsBoth eyes of 68 children with leukocoria were examined with CT scan.
sentences.chinese: 方法對68例兒童白瞳症患者進行雙眼CT掃描檢查。

sentences.english: The creature is unable to see well because of overstimulation of the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 生物因爲雙眼的刺激而無法清楚視物。

sentences.english: Angered even further, Kojiro leapt into combat, blinded by rage.
sentences.chinese: 因此，小次郎更加憤怒了，而被怒氣遮蔽了雙眼。

sentences.english: And when I lose my way, I close my eyes and he has found me.
sentences.chinese: 迷路時只需閉上雙眼，他就會找到我。

sentences.english: The reasonable color combination can make your beautiful eyes more charming and attractive.
sentences.chinese: 合理的色彩組合，令雙眼嫵媚動人。

sentences.english: Sky turned to gray, as dark as eyes still awake.
sentences.chinese: 灰色的天，暗如未睡的雙眼。

sentences.english: The rain-beads were aching my eyes.
Write dull eyes still staring at the dark night to close the.
sentences.chinese: 寫寫乏味了雙眼仍舊盯着漆黑的夜不肯合上。

sentences.english: You eyes are two pools that twinkle like starts in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 你的雙眼是兩汪清泉，就像那夜空中閃爍的星。

sentences.english: I look into your eyes and see who you are.
sentences.chinese: 讓我透過你的雙眼看看你是誰。

sentences.english: So close, that when you close your eyes, I fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 如此靠近，當你閉上你的雙眼，我沉沉入睡。

sentences.english: His eyes dazzled in the glare.
Evry where I look I see Ur eyes.
sentences.chinese: 我無論在哪都能看到你的雙眼。

sentences.english: I look at it through the eyes of God and find that all is well.
sentences.chinese: 我透過神的雙眼看它並發現一切不離至善。

sentences.english: Du Du's bright mahogany eyes fade when he mentions them.
sentences.chinese: 當他提到他們時，杜杜那雙明亮熱情的雙眼暗了下去。

sentences.english: A lock of hair had fallen down over her eyes.
sentences.chinese: 一綹劉海遮住她的雙眼。

definition: to gaze at/to fix one's eyes on
to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct
